page.title: 07A SCHOOL FOR CATHOLICS
page.content: {A Day in My Life { Today I am going to school. It is Friday and there is mass. I am going to read the hallelujah today. I walk into Church and go and sit in the front seat with my friends who are doing other readings. When it is my turn, I go up and read as well as I can. When mass is over we leave the Church and return to school which is in the same yard. We do our work, then we say our prayers. The bell rings and we go to the canteen to eat our dinner. In the afternoon we have Mrs.Bowen and we go out for games and do art. When it is time to go home we say our prayers and go home for tea.
